quotes.quote: Lingerie is the maximum expression of a woman's femininity.
Lingerie is my next love after clothing; I think it is what is worn underneath that really inspires a woman to feel beautiful in her clothes - that inner, secret glamour.
Lingerie is one of the most important pieces of your wardrobe. You can have a wardrobe malfunction if you dont choose the right thing to wear underneath!
Lingerie is not about seducing men, it's about embracing womanhood.
Trust the man who gifts you lingerie more than the man who gifts you roses, at least the former is clear about his intentions for you.
Lingerie is that inner, secret glamour.
For me, wearing lingerie isn't about anyone else but me. If I dressed for others I would be a miserable person.
I love to wear lingerie. The problem is that men always rip it off too quickly. When women are dolled up in lingerie they feel sexy. So let us wear it for five minutes.
I go to bed wearing a very baggy one-piece cheetah suit, just because it makes my son laugh. My sexy lingerie has been locked in a drawer for a while. Sandra Bullock
Real elegance is everywhere – especially in the things that don’t show.
One of my ex-husbands thought I had a breast job. They looked bigger. I just got the proper lingerie.
When it comes to lingerie, there are no rules. I feel the sexiest when I'm myself, no hair, no makeup.
Here's the thing about lingerie: The only time we see it outside our own bedrooms, it is on women who are gloriously freakish in their physical perfection.
She wore her pain like lingerie, only who loved her enough, got to see it.
They call it lingerie. I call it sensual innovation.
Give a girl the right lingerie and she can conquer the world.
If you're wearing lingerie that makes you feel glamorous, you're halfway there to turning heads.
I think lingerie plays a big part in how you carry yourself.
Ladies, if you truly want your man to be successful, never ever underestimate the power of a lipstick, sexy lingerie, and high heels.
